message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $9,500.  Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your offer, I'm still hoping for a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you meet me at $8,800?
